Body: Paris is the capital city of France, known for the Eiffel Tower and rich cultural heritage. Best time to visit: April to June, September to November. Attractions: Eiffel Tower (entry fee: 25 EUR, hours: 09:30 AM - 11:45 PM), Louvre Museum (entry fee: 17 EUR, hours: 09:00 AM - 06:00 PM). Hotels: Hotel Paris (location: Downtown Paris, price per night: 150, rating: 4.5), Budget Inn (location: Suburb Paris, price per night: 80, rating: 3.8). Restaurants: Le Gourmet (French Cuisine, rating: 4.7), Bistro Central (Casual Dining, rating: 4.2). Travel tips: Learn a few basic French phrases. Always keep an eye on your belongings, especially in crowded areas.

Tokyo is the bustling capital city of Japan, famous for its modernity and traditional temples. Best time to visit: March to May, September to November. Attractions: Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden (entry fee: 500 JPY, hours: 09:00 AM - 04:30 PM), Meiji Shrine (entry fee: Free, hours: Sunrise to Sunset). Hotels: Tokyo Inn (location: Shinjuku, price per night: 100, rating: 4.0), Luxury Palace (location: Ginza, price per night: 300, rating: 4.8). Restaurants: Sushi Zanmai (Japanese Cuisine, rating: 4.9), Ramen Ichiran (Casual Dining, rating: 4.5). Travel tips: Purchase a prepaid transport card for easy travel. Learn basic Japanese phrases for convenience.

New York City is a major city in the United States, known for its iconic landmarks like the Statue of Liberty and Times Square. Best time to visit: April to June, September to November. Attractions: Statue of Liberty (entry fee: 18.50 USD, hours: 08:30 AM - 04:00 PM), Central Park (entry fee: Free, hours: 06:00 AM - 01:00 AM). Hotels: The Plaza (location: Manhattan, price per night: 500, rating: 4.7), Budget Hostel (location: Brooklyn, price per night: 70, rating: 4.0). Restaurants: Joe's Pizza (American Cuisine, rating: 4.8), Le Bernardin (French Cuisine, rating: 4.9). Travel tips: Use public transportation to avoid traffic. Visit popular attractions early in the morning to avoid crowds.

Sydney is a vibrant city in Australia, known for its Sydney Opera House and beautiful beaches. Best time to visit: September to November, March to May. Attractions: Sydney Opera House (entry fee: 42 AUD, hours: 09:00 AM - 05:00 PM), Bondi Beach (entry fee: Free, hours: 24/7). Hotels: Sydney Harbour Hotel (location: Circular Quay, price per night: 200, rating: 4.6), Backpackers Inn (location: Kings Cross, price per night: 60, rating: 3.9). Restaurants: Quay (Australian Cuisine, rating: 4.7), Chat Thai (Thai Cuisine, rating: 4.5). Travel tips: Use sunscreen to protect from the strong sun. Explore the city using public ferries for unique views.

Rome is the capital city of Italy, famous for its ancient history and landmarks such as the Colosseum and Vatican City. Best time to visit: April to June, September to October. Attractions: Colosseum (entry fee: 16 EUR, hours: 08:30 AM - 07:00 PM), Vatican Museums (entry fee: 17 EUR, hours: 09:00 AM - 06:00 PM). Hotels: Hotel Roma (location: City Center, price per night: 120, rating: 4.4), Economy Inn (location: Termini Station, price per night: 75, rating: 3.7). Restaurants: La Pergola (Italian Cuisine, rating: 4.8), Trattoria Da Enzo (Casual Dining, rating: 4.6). Travel tips: Wear comfortable shoes for exploring the city. Book tickets for major attractions in advance to skip the lines.

London is the capital city of the United Kingdom, known for its historic landmarks such as the Tower of London and Buckingham Palace. Best time to visit: March to May. Attractions: Tower of London (entry fee: 28 GBP, hours: 09:00 AM - 05:30 PM), British Museum (entry fee: Free, hours: 10:00 AM - 05:30 PM). Hotels: The Ritz (location: Mayfair, price per night: 450, rating: 4.9), Budget Stay (location: Camden, price per night: 80, rating: 4.0). Restaurants: Dishoom (Indian Cuisine, rating: 4.7), The Ledbury (Modern European Cuisine, rating: 4.8). Travel tips: Use an Oyster card for convenient travel. Visit free museums for a budget-friendly trip.

Berlin is the capital city of Germany, known for its vibrant culture and history, including the Berlin Wall and Brandenburg Gate. Best time to visit: May to September. Attractions: Berlin Wall Memorial (entry fee: Free, hours: 08:00 AM - 10:00 PM), Brandenburg Gate (entry fee: Free, hours: 24/7). Hotels: Hotel Adlon (location: Mitte, price per night: 350, rating: 4.7), City Hostel (location: Kreuzberg, price per night: 70, rating: 4.1). Restaurants: Hofbräu Berlin (German Cuisine, rating: 4.5), Restaurant Tim Raue (Asian-European Fusion, rating: 4.8). Travel tips: Rent a bike to explore the city. Visit the many parks and gardens.

Barcelona is a major city in Spain, known for its art and architecture, particularly the Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. Best time to visit: May to June, September to October. Attractions: Sagrada Familia (entry fee: 20 EUR, hours: 09:00 AM - 08:00 PM), Park Güell (entry fee: 10 EUR, hours: 08:00 AM - 09:30 PM). Hotels: W Barcelona (location: Barceloneta, price per night: 300, rating: 4.6), Budget Rooms (location: Eixample, price per night: 60, rating: 4.0). Restaurants: Can Culleretes (Spanish Cuisine, rating: 4.7), Tickets Bar (Tapas, rating: 4.8). Travel tips: Use public transportation to get around the city. Visit attractions early to avoid crowds.

Dubai is a major city in the United Arab Emirates, known for its modern architecture, shopping, and vibrant nightlife. Best time to visit: November to March. Attractions: Burj Khalifa (entry fee: 149 AED, hours: 08:30 AM - 11:00 PM), Dubai Mall (entry fee: Free, hours: 10:00 AM - 12:00 AM). Hotels: Burj Al Arab (location: Jumeirah, price per night: 1000, rating: 4.9), Budget Lodge (location: Deira, price per night: 80, rating: 3.8). Restaurants: Al Mahara (Seafood, rating: 4.8), Zuma (Japanese Cuisine, rating: 4.7). Travel tips: Dress modestly in public areas. Use the metro for affordable transportation.

Rio de Janeiro is a major city in Brazil, famous for its beaches, Carnival festival, and the Christ the Redeemer statue. Best time to visit: December to March. Attractions: Christ the Redeemer (entry fee: 24 BRL, hours: 08:00 AM - 07:00 PM), Copacabana Beach (entry fee: Free, hours: 24/7). Hotels: Copacabana Palace (location: Copacabana, price per night: 400, rating: 4.8), Budget Stay (location: Lapa, price per night: 50, rating: 3.9). Restaurants: Churrascaria Palace (Brazilian Cuisine, rating: 4.7), Aprazível (Contemporary Cuisine, rating: 4.6). Travel tips: Be cautious of your belongings, especially at the beach. Use official taxis or ride-sharing apps for transportation.
